titles.title: All hail the power (Queens Of Apostles Version)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All hail the power
of Jesus' name.
Let angels prostate fall;
Bring forth the royal diadem;
To crown him, crown him,
crown him, crown him,
Lord of all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ye chosen seed
of Israel's race.
Ye ransomed from the
fall Hail, him who saves
you by his grace;
And crown him, crown him,
crown him, crown him,
Lord of all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sinners whose love
can ne'er forget,
the wormhood and the gall;
Go spread your trophies
at his feet;
Now crown him, crown him,
crown him, crown him,
Lord of all.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines:
O that with yonder
sacred throng.
We at his feet may fall;
we'll join the
everlasting song;
To crown him, crown him,
crown him, crown him,
Lord of all.
